photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White,  Custom Color (limited))
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries (Alkalines supplied)
continuousshooting: ¹ Under conditions where the flash does not fire. ² Depending on memory card speed / capacity / compression setting.
batterylife: ¹ Using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera (where included), except where indicated.
selftimer: Approx. 2 or 10 sec., Custom or FaceSelf-Timer
flashexposurecompensation: Face Detection FE, Smart Flash Exposure
closestfocusingdistance: 1cm (W) from front of lens in macro
construction: 7 elements in 6 groups (1 single sided aspherical lens)
modes: Auto*, P, Movie, Special Scene (Portrait, Night Snapshot, Kids & Pets, Indoor, FaceSelf-Timer, Low Light (2.0MP), Super Vivid, Poster Effect, Beach, Foliage, Snow, Fireworks, Long Shutter) *with Scene Detection Technology and Motion Detection Technology
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre)
zoom: ¹ Digital zoom available for still image and standard movie modes only. Optical zoom may not be available during movie recording. ² Depending on the image size selected.
